document.full_text: a devastating tsunami triggered by the biggest earthquake on record in japan looked set to kill at least 1,000 people along the northeastern coast on friday after a wall of water swept away everything in its path.
document.title: japan's quake toll set to exceed 1,000
lines_and_colors: a devastating tsunami triggered by the biggest earthquake on record in japan looked set to kill at least 1,000 people along the northeastern coast on friday after a wall of water swept away everything in its path.
